parameters.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticker_universe (
  symbol TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  exchange TEXT,
  market_cap BIGINT,
  volume BIGINT,
  trailing_pe DOUBLE PRECISION,
  fifty_two_week_high DOUBLE PRECISION,
  fifty_two_week_low DOUBLE PRECISION,
  dividend_yield DOUBLE PRECISION,
  total_revenue BIGINT,
  gross_margins DOUBLE PRECISION,
  info_raw JSONB,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP,
  last_scanned TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticker_scores (
symbol TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
score INTEGER,
recommendation TEXT,
reason TEXT,
last_updated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticker_buys (
  symbol TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
  thesis TEXT,                  -- Original alpha thesis
  original_conviction INTEGER, -- Initial conviction score (frozen)
  last_conviction INTEGER,     -- Previous conviction score
  conviction INTEGER,          -- Current conviction score
  last_updated TIMESTAMP       -- Timestamp of last update
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS daily_prices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price_open DECIMAL(10,2),
    price_1hr_after_open DECIMAL(10,2),
    price_close DECIMAL(10,2),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    UNIQUE(symbol, date)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portfolio_positions  (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now(),
  symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
  allocation_usd NUMERIC(10,2),
  conviction INTEGER,
  total_portfolio_value NUMERIC(10,2),
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS daily_valuation (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    strategy VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,      -- 'hold', 'daily', 'weekly'
    trade_session_id VARCHAR(50),       -- For grouping multi-day positions
    allocation_usd DECIMAL(15,2),       -- Original USD allocation
    quantity_held DECIMAL(15,6),        -- Number of shares
    entry_price DECIMAL(10,2),          -- Price at position entry
    current_price DECIMAL(10,2),        -- Current price (varies by strategy)
    value_close DECIMAL(15,2),          -- Current position value
    profit_loss DECIMAL(15,2),          -- P&L vs original allocation
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    UNIQUE(date, symbol, strategy)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS price_snapshots (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    price_open DECIMAL(10,2),           -- 9:30 AM Central
    price_1hr_after_open DECIMAL(10,2), -- 10:30 AM Central  
    price_close DECIMAL(10,2),          -- 4:00 PM Central
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    UNIQUE(symbol, date)
);

parameters.content: We need to add $1000 into the daily_positions table in order to seed this

parameters.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS daily_positions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  shares_bought DECIMAL(15,6) DEFAULT 0,
  shares_sold DECIMAL(15,6) DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE(symbol, date)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weekly_positions (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol TEXT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  shares_bought DECIMAL(15,6) DEFAULT 0,
  shares_sold DECIMAL(15,6) DEFAULT 0,
  buy_price DECIMAL(15,6),
  sell_price DECIMAL(15,6),
  conviction_at_buy DECIMAL(5,2),
  conviction_at_sell DECIMAL(5,2),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  UNIQUE(symbol, date, shares_bought, shares_sold)
);

parameters.content: We need to add $1000 into the weekly_positions table in order to seed this
